description: This Kotlin source file defines an Android RecyclerView adapter for displaying menu items in a food delivery app. It manages view creation, data binding, and user interactions for menu item listings.

classes.name: MenuItemAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter for displaying MenuItem objects, supporting item interactions such as add, increment, decrement, favorite toggle, and opening reviews.

methods.name: Diff
methods.description: Defines logic for calculating differences between lists of MenuItem objects for efficient RecyclerView updates.

methods.name: VH
methods.description: ViewHolder class holding references to UI components of a menu item view.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new ViewHolder object, inflating the layout item_menu.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds MenuItem data to UI components within the ViewHolder, setting event listeners and managing UI state based on data.
